title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-10.4 - Sharp edges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-10.4 - Sharp edges

State Regulations

Parts of the burner that may normally come in contact
with the operator's hand or arm during normal usage shall be free from sharp
edges or projections and projecting screwheads or ends. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-10.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
